name: Adaptability
description: Moves that are the same type as you deal +4 damage.

name: Aerilate
description: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Flying-type moves.

name: Aftermath
description: When knocked out by a melee attack, the attacker loses 1d20 HP.

name: Analytic
description: When attacking a foe who has already acted this round, deal +4 damage.

name: Anger Point
description: When hit by a critical hit, raise Attack +6 for 10 mins.

name: Anger Shell
description: While you are below 20 HP, your attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Armor Tail
description: You are immune to priority attacks that are used out of turn order during combat.

name: Aroma Veil
description: You and your allies within 10ft of you are immune to the effects of the moves Heal Block, Taunt, Encore, and Disable and the passive Cursed Body.

name: Battery
description: Allies within 15 ft of you have +1 Special Attack.

name: Battle Armor
description: Critical hits are treated as normal hits against you.

name: Berserk
description: While below half HP, you have +2 Special Attack.

name: Big Pecks
description: Your Defense cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

name: Blaze
description: When you are below 20 HP, your Fire type attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Cheek Pouch
description: Whenever you consume a berry, you recover 10 HP in addition to any other effects.

name: Chlorophyll
description: While in Sunny Weather, your Speed is +2.

name: Clear Body
description: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

name: Cloud Nine
description: As a free action you may deplete one use of Defog and use Defog.

name: Color Change
description: Whenever you are attacked, your type is changed to the same type as the attack after taking damage and effects for 5 mins.

name: Comatose
description: You are always Asleep but can still act as if you aren’t. You are also immune to other afflictions.

name: Commander
description: When adjacent to an allied Dondozo, Tatsugiri can go into Dondozo’s mouth as a free action. While inside the allied Dondozo’s mouth, Tatsugiri cannot act and its Skills and Passives cannot be used, but the allied Dondozo has +2 to its Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed. Additionally, Tatsugiri cannot be targeted or hit by any attacks, is unaffected by the effects of any moves, and allows the allied Dondozo to use any of Tatsugiri’s moves.

name: Competitive
description: If a foe lowers any of your stats, you have +2 Special Attack until your lowered stats are returned to normal.

name: Compound Eyes
description: Add +1 during accuracy check whenever you use a ranged attack.

name: Corrosion
description: You can Poison and Toxify Steel-types and Poison-types.

name: Costar
description: At the start of combat, copy a stat passive from your nearest ally until the end of combat.

name: Cud Chew
description: When you consume a berry, its effect will activate a second time 1 round of combat later.

name: Curious Medicine
description: Your stats and your adjacent ally’s stats cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

name: Cursed Body
description: When you are hit by a foe’s melee attack, disable that attack for 10 mins. Cursed Body can only affect one attack at a time.

name: Cute Charm
description: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Infatuate the attacker.

name: Damp
description: Chloroblast, Explosion, Misty Explosion, and Self-Destruct fail to do anything if used within 40ft of you.

name: Dazzling
description: You may not be targeted by Priority moves that are being used out of turn order.

name: Defeatist
description: When your HP is below half of your max hit points, your stats are all -2.

name: Defiant
description: If a foe lowers any of your stats, you have +2 Attack until your lowered stats are returned to normal.

name: Disguise
description: The first time you are hit with an attack each encounter, the attack is negated.

name: Download
description: Your Attack is +1 against targets with lower Defense than Special Defense. Your Special Attack is +1 against targets with lower Special Defense than Defense.

name: Drizzle
description: As a free action you may deplete one use of Rain Dance and use Rain Dance.

name: Drought
description: As a free action you may deplete one use of Sunny Day and use Sunny Day.

name: Dry Skin
description: In sunny weather, you lose 4 HP at the end of your actions. In rainy weather, you recover 4 HP at the end of your actions. You are immune to Water-type attacks.

name: Early Bird
description: You roll twice during checks to wake from Sleep and use the higher result.

name: Earth Eater
description: When you are hit by a Ground-type attack, halve the damage, then you heal that much HP instead of taking damage.

name: Effect Spore
description: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, randomly either Paralyze, Poison, or put to Sleep the attacker.

name: Electric Surge
description: As a free action you may deplete one use of Electric Terrain and use Electric Terrain.

name: Electromorphosis
description: When hit by an attack that deals damage, you may use the move Charge as a free action.

name: Emergency Exit
description: You cannot fight when first damaged below half of Max HP. You will want to run away or return to a Poke Ball for 2 rounds. During those two rounds, your speed is doubled.

name: Exposed
description: When you move or use an attack, you have –8 Defense and –8 Special Defense until your next turn. You also deal –8 damage with all attacks.

name: Filter
description: Super-effective attacks against you deal –4 damage after applying weakness.

name: Fur Coat
description: If hit by a move using the Attack stat, you only take half the damage you would take.

name: Gale Wings
description: If you use a Flying Type Move during your turn, your Speed is +2 until your next turn.

name: Galvanize
description: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Electric-type moves.

name: Good as Gold
description: You are immune to Effect moves.

name: Grass Pelt
description: While in Grassy Terrain, your Defense is +2.

name: Grassy Surge
description: As a free action you may deplete one use of Grassy Terrain and use Grassy Terrain.

name: Guard Dog
description: If a foe’s effect would cause you to flee or be moved, instead your Attack is raised +1 for 10 mins.

name: Gulp Missile
description: Whenever Cramorant goes underwater, it gathers waste in its mouth. When hit by an attack within 30ft while Cramorant has waste, Cramorant ejects the waste at the offender, dealing 4 damage or 8 damage if Cramorant has less than 20 HP. Waste is held for up to 5 mins.

name: Guts
description: While afflicted, your Attack is +2.

name: Flame Body
description: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Burn the attacker.

name: Flare Boost
description: While Burned, your Special Attack is +4.

name: Flash Fire
description: You are immune to Fire-type attacks. If you would be hit by a Fire-type attack, your Fire type attacks deal +4 damage for 2 mins.

name: Flower Gift
description: While Cherrim is in Sunny Weather, Cherrim’s Attack and Special Defense is +6.

name: Flower Veil
description: You and your allied Grass-type’s stats cannot be lowered by effects within 25ft of you.

name: Fluffy
description: If hit by a melee attack, you only take half the damage. If hit by a Fire-type attack, you take twice the damage.

name: Forecast
description: Your appearance and type changes with the weather. In Hailing, Hazy, or Misty weather, Castform is Ice-type. In Raining weather, Castform is Water-type. In Sandstorming weather, Castform is Rock-type. In Sunny weather, Castform is Fire-type.

name: Friend Guard
description: Allies within 25ft of you take -1d4 damage when attacked.

name: Harvest
description: When using a Berry, you only use half of it while still gaining its full effects. You can only use half of a Berry if you have Harvest.

name: Healer
description: After acting, you may roll 1d20. On 16 or higher, any adjacent allies are cured of all afflictions.

name: Heatproof
description: Fire-type attacks are resisted by you. If you are already resistant to Fire-type, remove an additional damage die.

name: Hunger Switch
description: Whenever Morpeko acts, it changes from Full Belly mode to Hangry mode or back into Full Belly mode from Hangry mode. Aura Wheel is Electric-type in Full Belly mode, Aura Wheel is Dark-type in Hangry mode.

name: Hustle
description: Your attacks against foes have -2 Accuracy. After the first time you miss an attack during an encounter, the -2 Accuracy penalty is removed and you gain +4 Attack until the end of the encounter.

name: Hydration
description: While in Raining weather, you are cured of any afflictions.

name: Hyper Cutter
description: Your Attack cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

name: Ice Body
description: If in Hailing weather, you recover 4 HP after you act and you don’t take damage from Hailing weather.

name: Ice Face
description: The first time Eiscue is hit with a melee attack each encounter; the attack is negated and you change to No Ice Face Form. Ice Face is reset whenever it starts Hailing while you are within its area of effect.

name: Ice Scales
description: If hit by a Special Attack, you only take half the damage you would take.

name: Illusion
description: As a free action, you may change your appearance to look like any Pokémon you have interacted with within the past hour. You may not appear as a Pokémon more than twice your size and the illusion is dropped when you are hit by an attack.

name: Immunity
description: You are immune to getting Poisoned and Toxified.

name: Imposter
description: As a free action you may use Transform.

name: Infiltrator
description: Hindering terrain and Walls do not affect you or your attacks.

name: Innards Out
description: When you are knocked out by a melee attack, deal damage to the attacker equal to the damage you just took.

name: Inner Focus
description: You are immune to being Stunned.

name: Insomnia
description: You are immune to being put to Sleep.

name: Iron Barbs
description: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, the attacker takes 4 damage.

name: Iron Fist
description: Your punching attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Justified
description: When a foe hits you with a Dark-type attack, your Attack is +1 for 10 mins.

name: Keen Eye
description: Your accuracy checks cannot be negatively affected by foes.

name: Leaf Guard
description: While in sunny weather, you are cured of any afflictions.

name: Levitate
description: You are immune to Ground-type moves while you are airborne.

name: Libero
description: You may change your types to the same types as an attack you are making while making it for 10 mins.

name: Lightning Rod
description: Any foe’s ranged Electric-type attacks within 25ft or any adjacent foe’s Electric-type attacks are negated and drawn to you. Your Special Attack is +2 until the end of your next turn whenever you negate an Electric-type attack.

name: Limber
description: You are immune to being Paralyzed.

name: Lingering Aroma
description: When you are hit by a foe’s melee attack, disable all of the foe’s ability passives, then they gain Lingering Aroma for 10 mins.

name: Liquid Ooze
description: If you are hit by an attack that damages you and heals the attacker, the attacker is dealt damage equal to what they would have healed, instead of healing.

name: Liquid Voice
description: Sound-based moves made by you are Water-type.

name: Magma Armor
description: You are immune to being Frozen.

name: Marvel Scale
description: While afflicted, your Defense is +2.

name: Mega Launcher
description: Your pulse attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Merciless
description: On hit, your attacks are critical hits if the target is Poisoned or Toxified.

name: Mimicry
description: After acting, your type changes to reflect your current surroundings. If you are in a grassy field, Grass type; if you are in water, Water type; if you are on a mountain, Rock type; etc.

name: Minus
description: If at least one ally has Plus or Minus within 10ft of you, you have +3 Special Attack.

name: Mirror Armor
description: If your stats would be lowered by a foe’s effects, instead that offender’s stat is lowered.

name: Misty Surge
description: As a free action you may deplete one use of Misty Terrain and use Misty Terrain.

name: Mold Breaker
description: Your attacks ignore any passives that would redirect, negate or weaken your attacks.

name: Motor Drive
description: Any Electric-type attack that hits you is negated and your speed is +1 for 10 mins. This can stack.

name: Multiscale
description: When you are at Max HP, you take –4 damage from all attacks.

name: Mummy
description: When you are hit by a foe’s melee attack, disable all of the foe’s ability passives, then they gain Mummy for 10 mins

name: Mycelium Might
description: When using an attack that can cause afflictions, ignore any immunities that foes may have when applying the affliction.

name: Natural Cure
description: Whenever returned to a Poke Ball, you are cured of any afflictions.

name: Neutralizing Gas
description: Ability passives other than your own do not work within 10ft of you.

name: No Guard
description: You cannot miss your attacks, and attacks made against you cannot miss.

name: Normalize
description: Attacks performed by you are treated as Normal-type attacks.

name: Oblivious
description: You are immune to Infatuation.

name: Pressure
description: If you are hit by a 3/day attack, the attacker can’t use that attack for the remainder of the day.

name: Propeller Tail
description: Your attacks cannot be redirected by passives or any other ability, instead only hitting a target your attack was directed at.

name: Overcoat
description: You are immune to damage from weather.

name: Overgrow
description: When you are below 20 HP, your Grass-type attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Own Tempo
description: You are immune to being Confused.

name: Pastel Veil
description: You and your allies within 10ft of you are immune to being Poisoned or Toxified.

name: Perish Body
description: When you are hit by a melee attack, the offender receives 3 Perish Coats. The Coat has the following ability: After acting, destroy one of your Perish Coats. If this is the third Perish Coat you’ve destroyed this way during this encounter, set your HP to 0.

name: Pickpocket
description: When you are hit by a melee attack, you steal the offender’s held item, if any.

name: Pixilate
description: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Fairy-type moves.

name: Plus
description: If at least one ally has Plus or Minus within 10ft of you, you have +3 Special Attack.

name: Poison Heal
description: While afflicted with Poison or Toxification, you are healed instead of damaged by those afflictions. You are cured of Poison or Toxin once you are at Max HP.

name: Poison Point
description: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Poison the attacker.

name: Poison Touch
description: Whenever you hit with a melee attack, you may roll 1d6. On 6, Poison the target.

name: Power of Alchemy
description: When an ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, you gain one of your ally’s passives for 2 mins.

name: Power Spot
description: Attacks made within 10ft of you deal +4 damage, regardless if the attacker is friend or foe.

name: Prankster
description: Your attacks that do not deal damage on hit have Priority.

name: Protean
description: You may change your types to the same type as an attack you are making while making it for 10 mins.

name: Psychic Surge
description: As a free action you may deplete one use of Psychic Terrain and use Psychic Terrain.

name: Punk Rock
description: Your sound-based attacks deal +4 damage. You take 4 less damage from sound-based attacks.

name: Purifying Salt
description: You are immune to status afflictions. You are resistant to Ghost-type attacks.

name: Queenly Majesty
description: You may not be targeted by Priority moves that are being used out of turn order.

name: Quick Draw
description: 1/day, you may give one of your moves priority.

name: Quick Feet
description: While afflicted, your Speed is +2.

name: Rain Dish
description: If in Raining Weather, you regain 4 HP after you act.

name: Rattled
description: When a foe hits you with a Bug-type, Ghost-type, or Dark-type attack, your Speed is +1 for 10 mins. This can stack.

name: Receiver
description: When an ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, you gain one of your ally’s passives for 2 mins.

name: Reckless
description: Your attacks that damage yourself on hit, deal +4 damage.

name: Refrigerate
description: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Ice-type moves.

name: Regenerator
description: When returned to a Poke Ball, you recover to Max HP after being stored for 1 hour.

name: Ripen
description: When you use a Berry, double any effects it has.

name: Rock Head
description: Your attacks that damage yourself on hit do not damage yourself.

name: Rocky Payload
description: Your Rock-type attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Rough Skin
description: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, the attacker takes 4 damage.

name: Sand Force
description: While in Sandstorming Weather, your Rock-type and Ground-type attacks deal +4 damage and you don’t take damage from Sandstorming weather.

name: Sand Rush
description: While in Sandstorming Weather, your Speed is +2 and you don’t take damage from Sandstorming weather.

name: Sand Spit
description: When you are hit by a melee attack, as a free action you may deplete one use of Sandstorm and use Sandstorm immediately.

name: Sand Stream
description: As a free action you may deplete one use of Sandstorm and use Sandstorm.

name: Sand Veil
description: While in Sandstorming Weather, any foe’s attacks made against you have -1 during accuracy check and you don’t take damage from Sandstorming weather.

name: Sap Sipper
description: You are immune to Grass-type attacks. If you would be hit by a Grass-type attack, your Attack is +2 for 10 mins.

name: Schooling
description: When Wishiwashi is at half its HP or higher, it is in its School form. In its School form, Wishiwashi summons hundreds of fish-shaped balls of water and surrounds itself making it appear larger and making it stronger. When Wishiwashi is below half of its max hit points, Wishiwashi is in its Single form, dropping its façade and appearing much smaller on its own.

name: Scrappy
description: Your Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can hit Ghost-type targets.

name: Screen Cleaner
description: Whenever you move through a Wall, Hazard, or adjacent to someone with a Coat, destroy all Walls, Hazards and Coats.

name: Seed Sower
description: When you are hit by an attack that dealt damage, as a free action you may deplete one use of Grassy Terrain and use Grassy Terrain immediately.

name: Sharpness
description: Your slashing attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Shed Skin
description: After acting, you may roll 1d4. On 4, you are cured of any afflictions.

name: Sheer Force
description: Your attacks that have additional effects that affect the target may deal +4 damage, but will not have those additional effects.

name: Shell Armor
description: Critical hits are treated as normal hits against you.

name: Shields Down
description: When Minior’s HP is at or below half of its max hit points, its form changes to Core Revealed. While Minior is not in its Core Revealed form, it is immune to afflictions.

name: Shield Dust
description: You are unaffected by additional effects from attacks that deal damage.

name: Skill Link
description: Your scatter moves have +2 during Accuracy Check.

name: Slush Rush
description: While in Hailing weather, your Speed is +2 and you don’t take damage from Hailing weather.

name: Sniper
description: When you land a critical hit, you deal an additional 8 damage.

name: Snow Cloak
description: While in Hailing weather, any foe’s attacks made against you have -1 during Accuracy Check and you don’t take damage from Hailing weather.

name: Snow Warning
description: As a free action you may deplete one use of Hail and use Hail.

name: Solar Power
description: While in Sunny weather, you deal an additional 4 damage while attacking. After acting in Sunny weather, you take 4 damage.

name: Solid Rock
description: Super-effective attacks against you deal –4 damage.

name: Soundproof
description: You are immune to sound-based attacks.

name: Stakeout
description: When you attack a target who has just joined the encounter since your last turn, you deal +4 damage.

name: Stalwart
description: Your attacks cannot be redirected by passives or any other effect (except by interception), instead only hitting a target your attack was directed at.

name: Stance Change
description: Aegislash has two forms it constantly changes between. When you attack a foe, before making your accuracy check change into your Sword Form. When using a reaction move such as King’s Shield or Protect, or a protective move like Safeguard or Light Screen, immediately change to Shield Form.

name: Static
description: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Paralyze the attacker.

name: Steadfast
description: When you are Stunned, your Speed is +1 for 10 mins.

name: Steam Engine
description: When a foe hits you with a Fire-type or Water-type attack, your Speed is +2 for 10 mins.

name: Steelworker
description: Your Steel-type attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Steely Spirit
description: Steel-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

name: Stench
description: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Stun the attacker.

name: Sticky Hold
description: You cannot drop held items or have held items stolen from you.

name: Storm Drain
description: Any foe’s ranged Water-type attacks within 25ft or any adjacent foe’s Water-type attacks are negated and drawn to you. Your Special Attack is +2 until the end of your next turn whenever you negate a Water-type attack.

name: Strong Jaw
description: Your biting attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Sturdy
description: If you would be brought from Max HP to 0 or below, you are instead brought to 1 HP.

name: Suction Cups
description: You cannot be moved by a foe’s attacks.

name: Supreme Overlord
description: When you join combat, your Attack and Special Attack are each raised +1 for each ally who has already been knocked out in the current encounter, for 10 mins. Supreme Overlord can only raise your Attack and Special Attack each up to +4.

name: Surge Surfer
description: While in Electrified terrain, your Speed is +2.

name: Swarm
description: When you are below 20 HP, your Bug-type attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Sweet Veil
description: You and your allies within 10ft of you are immune to being put to Sleep.

name: Swift Swim
description: While in Raining weather or in water, your Speed is +2.

name: Symbiosis
description: You can pass held items to allies within 10ft as a free action.

name: Synchronize
description: When you are Burned, Confused, Frozen, Poisoned, Paralyzed, put to Sleep, or Toxified by a foe, the offender is also given the same affliction.

name: Tangled Feet
description: While you are confused, any foe’s attacks made against you have -1 during accuracy check.

name: Technician
description: When rolling damage, replace any rolled 1s or 2s with 3.

name: Telepathy
description: Your allies within 25ft do not harm you when the ally is using attacks that have an area of effect.

name: Thermal Exchange
description: You are immune to being Burned. When you are hit by a Fire-type attack, your Attack is +2 for 10 mins.

name: Thick Fat
description: You take -4 damage from Fire-type attacks and Ice-type attacks.

name: Tinted Lens
description: Your resisted attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Too Pure
description: All attacks made against you are treated as if they are super-effective. If the attack already is, the attacker rolls +1 dice while rolling for damage.

name: Torrent
description: When you are below 20 HP, your Water-type attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Tough Claws
description: Your slashing attacks deal +4 damage.

name: Toxic Boost
description: If you would have been Poisoned, or Toxified, you are not and your Attack is +2 for 2 mins.

name: Toxic Debris
description: When you are hit by an attack that dealt damage, as a free action you may deplete one use of Toxic Spikes and use Toxic Spikes immediately.

name: Triage
description: Any moves you know that can heal have Reaction.

name: Truant
description: All your moves have recharge turns. Truant cannot be removed or disabled by any means.

name: Unnerve
description: Foes within 25ft of you cannot consume food.

name: Vital Spirit
description: You are immune to being put to Sleep.

name: Volt Absorb
description: When you are hit by an electric-type attack, halve the damage, then you heal that much HP instead of taking damage.

name: Wandering Spirit
description: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, you gain all of the offender’s ability passives and lose Wandering Spirit, then they gain Wandering Spirit and lose all of their ability Passives for 10 mins.

name: Water Absorb
description: When you are hit by a water-type attack, halve the damage, then you heal that much HP instead of taking damage.

name: Water Bubble
description: You take -4 damage from Fire-type attacks. You add +4 damage to Water-type attacks. You are immune to being Burned.

name: Water Compaction
description: When a foe hits you with a Water-type attack, your Defense is +2 for 10 mins.

name: Water Veil
description: You are immune to being Burned.

name: Weak Armor
description: When you are hit by a melee attack, your Defense is lowered -3 and your Speed is raised +3 for 10 mins.

name: Well-Baked Body
description: You are immune to Fire-type attacks. When you are hit by Fire-type attacks, instead your Defense is +2 for 10 mins.

name: White Smoke
description: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

name: Wind Power
description: When hit by a wind based attack, you may use the move Charge as a free action.

name: Wonder Guard
description: You are immune to all attacks that are not super-effective against you. Wonder Guard cannot be disabled or removed by any means.

name: Wonder Skin
description: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe’s effects.

name: Zen Mode
description: When Darmanitan is below half of its max hit points, it changes to its Zen Mode form.

name: Zero to Hero
description: When you have 30 Hp or less, or an ally is knocked out within 30 ft of you, you change from Zero form to Hero form for 10 minutes
